documents.document: This world is but a canvas to our imagination. ~Henry David Thoreau
The most important story you will ever hear about yourself, is the one you tell to yourself. ~Tony Robbins
Your life is your message to the world. Make sure it’s inspiring.
Success isn’t a result of spontaneous combustion. You must set yourself on fire. ~Arnold H. Glasow
The time is always right to do what is right. ~Martin Luther King Jr.
What you do with what you have is even more important than how much you have of it. ~Kevin Eastman
Money will buy you a bed, but not a good night’s sleep, a house but not a home, a companion but not a friend.
Everyone should be respected as an individual, but no one idolized. ~Albert Einstein
Every achiever that I have ever met says, ‘My life turned around when I began to believe in me. ~Dr. Robert Schuller
Retirement may be looked upon as a prolonged-holiday or as a rejection, a being thrown on the scrap heap. ~Simone de Beavoir
That men do not learn very much from the lessons of history is the most important of all the lessons of history. ~Aldous Huxley
Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn’t do than by the ones you did do. ~Mark Twain
You can never quit. Winners never quit, and quitters never win.
Some people think they will feel good if certain things happen. The trick is: you have to feel good for no reason. ~Richard Bandler
We must always change, renew, rejuvenate ourselves; otherwise, we harden. ~Goethe
I have everything, yet have nothing; and although I possess nothing, still of nothing am I in want. ~Terence
That sense of sacredness, that thinking in generations, must begin with reverence for this earth. ~Paul Tsongas
No really great man ever thought himself so. ~William Hazlitt
There is no need for temples... Our own brain, our own heart is our temple; the philosophy is kindness. ~Dalai Lama
No human thing is of serious importance. ~Plato
Don't let a bad day make you feel like you have a bad life.
Look at everything as though you were seeing it either for the first or last time. ~Betty Smith
Sometimes we expect more from others because we’d be willing to do that much for them.
I find hope in the darkest of days, and focus in the brightest. I do not judge the universe. ~Dalai Lama
The only difference between a tax man and a taxidermist is that the taxidermist leaves the skin. ~Mark Twain
If you wanna make the world a better place, take a look at yourself, and then make a change. ~Michael Jackson
If men were angels, no government would be necessary. ~James Madison
One important key to success is self-confidence. An important key to self-confidence is preparation. ~Arthur Ashe
The reason that ego and love are not compatible comes down to this: you cannot take your ego into the unknown, where love wants to lead. ~Deepak Chopra
No adversity is insurmountable. Regardless of odds, I know that with hard work and dedication I can achieve anything. ~Amy Alsop
The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate. ~Oprah Winfrey
I’ve seen and met angels wearing the disguise of ordinary people living ordinary lives. ~Tracy Chapman
The story of your life has many chapters. One bad chapter doesn’t mean it’s the end of the book.
Do what you feel in your heart to be right - for you’ll be criticized anyway. ~Eleanor Roosevelt
You cannot escape the responsibility of tomorrow by evading it today. ~Abraham Lincoln
In daily life we must see that it is not happiness that makes us grateful, but gratefulness that makes us happy.
The way I see it, if you want the rainbow, you gotta put up with the rain. ~Dolly Parton
Sometimes the thing we can’t change end up changing us.
RT @eMajels: Our greatest glory does not consist of never falling, but in rising every time we fall. #eMajelsQuotes
Laughter is the brush that sweeps away the cobwebs of your heart. ~Mort Walker
Nothing you wear is more important than your smile. ~Connie Stevens
We could never learn to be brave & patient, if there were only joys in the world. ~Helen Keller
Don’t get too comfortable, life can change right in front of your eyes.
The essence of all beautiful art, all great art, is gratitude. ~Friedrich Nietzsche
The most important thing is to enjoy your life - to be happy - it’s all that matters. ~Audrey Hepburn
Life is the art of drawing without an eraser. ~John W. Gardner
It is difficult to get a man to understand something when his salary depends on his not understanding it. ~Upton Sinclair
You can't live a perfect day without doing something for someone who will never be able to repay you. ~John Wooden
Those who are at war with others are not at peace with themselves. ~William Hazlitt
They who are of opinion that money will do everything may very well be suspected to do everything for money. ~George Savile
The most powerful control we can ever attain, is to be in control of ourselves. ~Chris Page
You can only grow if you are willing to feel awkward and uncomfortable when you try something new. ~Brian Tracy
I cannot change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination. ~Jimmy Dean
Humans are divided between those who can still look through the eyes of youth and those who cannot. ~Dave Eggers
Hold to the now, the here, through which all future plunges to the past. ~James Joyce
There is no such thing as failure. Failure is just life trying to move us in another direction. ~Oprah Winfrey
You must never doubt your ability to achieve anything, become anything, overcome anything and inspire everything. ~Tasha Hoggatt
The key to success is for you to make a habit throughout your life of doing the things you fear. ~Vincent Van Gogh
No person is your friend who demands your silence or denies your right to grow. ~Alice Walker
Focus on where you want to go, not on what you fear. ~Anthony Robbins
One must walk a long time behind a wild duck before one picks up an ostrich feather. ~Danish proverb
You can have anything you want if you are willing to give up the belief that you can’t have it. ~Robert Anthony
Things turn out best for the people who make the best of the way things turn out. ~Craig Lancaster
The best thing in life is finding someone who knows all your mistakes and weaknesses, and yet still thinks you’re completely amazing.
No person was ever honored for what he received. Honor has been the reward for what he gave. ~Calvin Coolidge
One loves to possess arms, though they hope never to have occasion for them. ~Thomas Jefferson
Do what makes you happy, and be with who makes you smile.
Nothing great in the world has ever been accomplished without passion. ~Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel
If you’ll not settle for anything less than your best, you will be amazed at what you can accomplish in your lives. ~Vince Lombardi
Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.
A dog is the only thing on earth that loves you more than you love yourself. ~Josh Billings
The way we communicate with others and with ourselves ultimately determines the quality of our lives. ~Tony Robbins
Sharing what you have is more important than what you have. ~Albert Wells
The happiest people don’t have the best of everything, they just make the best of everything they have.
There is no such thing as failure. Failure is just life trying to move us in another direction. ~Oprah Winfrey
The axe does not worry how thick the branches are. It cuts them to pieces. But not the leaves. It leaves the leaves alone. ~Rumi
The key to success is for you to make a habit throughout your life of doing the things you fear. ~Vincent Van Gogh
And the day came when the risk it took to stay tight inside the bud was more painful than the risk it took to blossom. ~Anais Nin
One secret of success in life is for a person to be ready for their opportunity when it comes. ~Benjamin Disraeli
It is important from time to time to slow down, to go away by yourself, and simply be. ~Eileen Caddy
A true leader creates a culture of spirits and hearts not just heads and hands. ~Ed Konczal
The power of positive thinking is like a car with a powerful engine that can take you to the summit of a mountain.
Life is a cycle, always in motion, if good times have moved on so will times of trouble. ~Indian Proverb
It’s so hard when I have to, and so easy when I want to. ~Annie Gottlier
Children learn to smile from their parents. ~Shinichi Suzuki
Don’t worry about spilling some paint while working on the big picture.
For those who believe, no proof is necessary. For those who don’t believe, no proof is possible. ~Stuart Chase
There is a vast difference between failure and temporary defeat. ~Napoleon Hill
Whether I fail or succeed shall be no man’s doing but my own. ~Elain Maxwell
You laugh it off, you get upset for a little while, you’re human and you let it go. ~Jennifer Lopez
The gift of fantasy has meant more to me than my talent for absorbing positive knowledge. ~Albert Einstein
Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage. ~Lao Tzu
We change the world not by what we say or do, but as a consequence of what we have become. ~Dr. David Hawkins
Life’s bittersweet. But you have the power to make it stay bitter or to sweeten it.
The time to repair a roof is when the sun is shining. ~John F. Kennedy
A single conversation across the table with a wise person is worth a month’s study of books. ~Chinese Proverb
If you think education is expensive try ignorance. ~Derek Bok
Don’t get too comfortable, life can change right in front of your eyes.
You can’t do anything about yesterday, and the only way to improve tomorrow is by what you do right now. ~John Wooden
Be someone who makes someone else look forward to tomorrow.
